def InitializeRow(entity, row): if ( entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() == 1 ): row.GetCellByName("STATUS").FontIcon = "fa fa-info-circle" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").TextColor = "#4B77BE" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Tooltip = "Em aprovação" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Text = "" elif ( entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() == 2 ): row.GetCellByName("STATUS").FontIcon = "fa fa-check-circle" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").TextColor = "#44B6AE" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Tooltip = "Aprovada" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Text = "" elif ( entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() == 3 ): row.GetCellByName("STATUS").FontIcon = "fa fa-times-circle" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").TextColor = "#E43A45" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Tooltip = "Recusada" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Text = "" else: row.GetCellByName("STATUS").TextColor = "#E87E04" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").FontIcon = "fa fa-info-circle" row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Tooltip = "Não participa de aprovação"
row.GetCellByName("NATUREZA").Tooltip = entity["NATUREZA"].GetString() row.GetCellByName("NATUREZA").Text = str( entity["NATUREZA"].GetDBValue() )
